text:
Move Forward

With Comfort

The latest Converse CX drop is here, featuring

the new Chuck Taylor All Star CX and the

All Star Slip CX. These Chucks are easy

to put on and too comfortable to take off.
title: Converse Official Site. Converse.com

meta_data.description: Shop Converse.com for shoes, clothing, gear and the latest collaboration. Find Classic Chuck, Chuck 70, One Star, Jack Purcell & More. Free shipping & returns.
